item.title: 中国玉米进口下降显示消费者信心受挫
item.description: 根据美国农业部的数据，中国本季玉米进口总量预计仅为 1400 万吨，不到几年前疯狂采购高峰期的一半。【原文：China’s corn imports are expected to total just 14 million tons in the current season, less than half of their peak during a buying spree a few years ago, according to the US Department of Agriculture.】

item.title: 日本工会负责人呼吁政府加快工资工作
item.description: 日本金属工人工会主席敦促政府加快加薪步伐，同时对央行过早采取紧缩措施表示担忧。【原文：The chair of Japan’s metalworkers’ union urged the government to accelerate efforts to raise pay, while expressing concern over premature tightening steps from the central bank.】

item.title: 新任印度央行行长下调利率赌注导致卢比跌幅扩大
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: Axiata 和 Sinar Mas 将以 65 亿美元的交易合并印尼分公司
item.description: 马来西亚无线运营商 Axiata 集团（Axiata Group Bhd.【原文：Malaysian wireless carrier Axiata Group Bhd. and Indonesian conglomerate PT Sinar Mas Group have agreed to merge their telecommunications operations in Indonesia in a deal that values the business at $6.5 billion.】

item.title: 拜登遏制贸易战后，习近平为美国贸易战准备讨价还价筹码
item.description: 如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）兑现其威胁，用关税惩罚世界第二大经济体，中国将展示一系列准备使用的新工具，从而在与美国迫在眉睫的贸易战中占得先机。【原文：China got a head start on a looming trade war with the US by showcasing a new range of tools it’s prepared to use if Donald Trump makes good on his threat to punish the world’s second-biggest economy with tariffs.】

item.title: 日元、掉期交易员对日本央行会议前发出的信号猜测不已
item.description: 过去一周，日本央行官员的言论和媒体报道对日本央行的意图发出了各种不同的信号，令交易员对日本央行何时可能加息感到困惑。【原文：Traders have been perplexed over the past week as to when the Bank of Japan may hike rates following comments from officials and media reports that sent mixed signals of the BOJ intentions.】

item.title: 报道称韩国总统宁愿弹劾也不愿辞职
item.description: 一家当地媒体报道称，韩国总统尹锡烈将为可能的弹劾而斗争，而不是提前下台。【原文：South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol will fight a possible impeachment rather than step down early, a local media report said, a stance that would likely lengthen the duration of the political chaos sparked by his martial law declaration.】

item.title: 日本人寿在日本最大的保险交易中收购 Resolution
item.description: 日本生命保险公司同意以约 82 亿美元的价格收购 Resolution Life Group Holdings Ltd.，这是日本保险公司寻求在国内市场以外发展的最大收购案。【原文：Nippon Life Insurance Co. agreed to buy Resolution Life Group Holdings Ltd. for about $8.2 billion, the biggest takeover by a Japanese insurer as it seeks to grow beyond the domestic market.】

item.title: TikTok 对加拿大单位关闭令提出法律挑战
item.description: TikTok Technology Canada Inc.以国家安全风险为由申请司法审查，对加拿大要求中国拜腾科技有限公司关闭其在加拿大的子公司的命令提出质疑。【原文：TikTok Technology Canada Inc. applied for a judicial review to challenge Canada’s order that China’s Bytedance Ltd. close its subsidiary in the country, citing national security risks.】

item.title: 谷歌高级说客在监管审查持续期间离职
item.description: 谷歌的顶级说客马克-伊萨科维茨（Mark Isakowitz）即将离职，在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第二次就职前不久，这家科技巨头失去了一位最著名的共和党高管。【原文：Google’s top lobbyist Mark Isakowitz is departing the company, leaving the tech giant without one of its most prominent Republican executives shortly before President-elect Donald Trump steps into office for a second time.】

item.title: APLMA 称私人债务刺激亚洲贷款交易
item.description: 据一家主要行业协会的报告称，私人信贷正在增强亚洲二级贷款市场的流动性，该市场长期以来一直在艰难起步。【原文：Private credit is bolstering liquidity in Asia’s secondary loan market, which has long struggled to take off, according to a report from a major trade association.】

item.title: 交易商倒计时美国通胀数据，黄金保持升势
item.description: 由于交易员们正在准备美国通胀数据，该数据将有助于决定美联储在下周举行的今年最后一次会议上是削减还是维持利率，因此黄金保持了连续三天的上涨。【原文：Gold held a three-day advance as traders prepared for US inflation data that will help determine whether the Federal Reserve cuts or holds rates next week at its final meeting of the year.】

item.title: 印度股市破纪录 2025 年面临更大障碍
item.description: 随着企业盈利减弱和全球基金对市场转为谨慎，印度股市史无前例的连胜势头可能会在 2025 年碰壁。【原文：An unprecedented winning streak for Indian stocks may hit a wall in 2025 as corporate earnings weaken and global funds turn cautious on the market.】

item.title: 日本生产者通胀率在加息押注期间超过预期
item.description: 日本企业商品价格的通胀速度加快到了 16 个月以来的最快速度，这一结果表明经济中的通胀压力越来越大，并支持中央银行进一步正常化政策。【原文：Inflation in Japan’s corporate goods prices accelerated to the fastest pace in 16 months, an outcome that points to growing inflationary pressure in the economy and supports the central bank’s further normalization of policy.】

item.title: 亚洲 PE 总裁辞去加拿大养老金职务，前往阿布扎比担任全球职务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）的亚洲私募股权主管已前往阿布扎比养老基金（Abu Dhabi Pension Fund）任职，加入了香港交易员在交易低迷时离开金融中心的浪潮。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board’s Asia private equity head has left for the Abu Dhabi Pension Fund, joining a wave of Hong Kong dealmakers exiting the financial hub amid a deals slump, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁将晚四年开始生产混合动力超级跑车
item.description: 阿斯顿-马丁拉贡达全球控股公司（Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc）将于2025年开始生产其首款插电式混合动力超级跑车，这比原计划晚了四年。【原文：Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc will begin making its first plug-in hybrid supercar in 2025 — four years later than originally planned — as the luxury carmaker tries to revive its fortunes.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据将连续第四个月稳健增长
item.description: 预测人员预计，美国消费者物价月度报告将显示物价连续第四个月坚挺上涨，这表明降低通胀的进展正在停滞。【原文：Forecasters expect a monthly report on US consumer prices to show a fourth-straight month of firm increases in prices, suggesting progress toward lower inflation is stalling.】

item.title: OpenAI 首席财务官认为企业用户将每月支付数千美元购买人工智能工具
item.description:
这家初创公司正在权衡根据其人工智能软件提供的价值向客户收取不同的费用。【原文：

The startup is weighing charging customers different rates based on the value provided by its artificial intelligence software. 

】

item.title: 石油在美国通胀数据和欧佩克市场报告公布前保持稳定
item.description: 在关键的美国通胀数据和欧佩克（OPEC）月度报告公布之前，石油市场保持稳定。【原文：Oil was steady ahead of key US inflation data and a monthly report from OPEC that will provide a snapshot on the market.】

item.title: CPI 逼近，亚洲股市开局低迷：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市开盘不温不火，交易商在等待关键的美国通胀数据，以寻找美联储下周是降息还是按兵不动的线索。【原文：Asian shares were poised for a tepid opening as traders await key US inflation data for clues on whether the Federal Reserve will cut or hold rates next week.】

item.title: 主宰韩国的权势家族面临投资者的反抗
item.description:
该国的政治动荡加剧了提振低迷股市和改革强大企业集团的紧迫性。【原文：

The country’s political turmoil is increasing the urgency to boost its flagging stock market and reform its powerful conglomerates.

】

item.title: 中国召开年度经济会议制定经济刺激计划
item.description: 中国将于周三召开年度经济工作会议，制定明年的政策，最高领导人暗示将在与美国潜在贸易战的威胁下采取更有力的刺激措施。【原文：China is set to begin its annual economic work meeting on Wednesday to map out policies for next year, with top leaders hinting at more forceful stimulus amid the threat of a potential trade war with the US.】

item.title: 废柴工作室老板助推腾讯全球游戏雄心
item.description: 十年前，腾讯控股有限公司的 MoreFun Studios 曾濒临倒闭。如今，这家拥有 1600 名员工的公司及其领导人张恩佐（Enzo Zhang）已成为这家中国娱乐公司打造国际大片的核心。【原文：A decade ago, Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s MoreFun Studios was on the verge of collapse. Now the 1,600-strong operation and its leader Enzo Zhang are at the heart of the Chinese entertainment company’s ambitions to craft international hits.】

item.title: Adobe 的人工智能视频推广落后于 OpenAI 推出的 Sora
item.description: Adobe 公司推出人工智能视频产品的速度远远慢于 OpenAI 的竞争对手 Sora 服务，这加剧了人们对这家创意软件公司落后的担忧。【原文：Adobe Inc. is rolling out its AI video product much more slowly than OpenAI’s rival Sora service, fueling concerns that the creative software company is falling behind.】

item.title: 在 CPI 数据被视为美联储关键数据之前，债券交易员削减多头押注
item.description: 在周三的美国消费者价格数据公布之前，债券交易员们纷纷抛出筹码，选择了更为中性的立场，因为该数据将对美联储本月是否再次降息的预期起到决定性作用。【原文：Bond traders are taking chips off the table, opting for a more neutral stance before Wednesday’s US consumer-price data, which will be decisive in setting expectations for whether the Federal Reserve cuts interest rates again this month.】

item.title: 激进投资者 Alta Fox 将提名达克创力董事人选
item.description: 这位激进投资者在彭博激进主义论坛 2024 上表示，Alta Fox Capital Management LLC 计划在 2022 年首次入股达克创力公司（Daktronics Inc.【原文：Alta Fox Capital Management LLC plans to nominate director candidates to the board of Daktronics Inc. after first amassing a stake in 2022, the activist investor said at the Bloomberg Activism Forum 2024.】

item.title: TikTok 向用户支付购物费用，前提是他们能提高应用程序的下载量
item.description: TikTok 向用户提供数百美元，让他们在该应用上花时间，邀请朋友加入，并在 TikTok Shop 上购买产品，目的是在该应用可能在美国被禁之前尽快扩大业务。【原文：TikTok is offering users hundreds of dollars to spend time in the app, invite friends to join and purchase products on TikTok Shop, in an effort to expand the business as quickly as possible ahead of its possible ban in the US.】

item.title: 耶伦被提名后与贝森特交谈，对财政感到遗憾
item.description: 即将卸任的财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提名斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）接任财政部长一职后，她与他进行了交谈。【原文：Outgoing Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said that she spoke with President-elect Donald Trump’s nominee to be her successor, Scott Bessent, after he was tapped for the job.】

item.title: 激进分子安森入股狮门影业，可能推动出售事宜
item.description: 2017 年 8 月 6 日星期日，美国加利福尼亚州圣莫尼卡，狮门娱乐公司总部内的办公桌上显示着标牌。狮门娱乐公司定于8月8日发布财报数据。【原文：Signage is displayed on a desk inside the Lions Gate Entertainment Corp. headquarters in Santa Monica, California, U.S., on Sunday, Aug. 6, 2017. Lions Gate Entertainment Corp. is scheduled to release earnings figures on August 8.】

item.title: 关税逼近，加拿大央行决定大幅削减关税：决策指南
item.description: 加拿大央行很可能连续第二次降息半个百分点，使借贷成本降至更加中性的水平，并使经济更好地应对关税战可能带来的交叉影响。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to cut interest rates by half a percentage point for a second consecutive meeting, bringing borrowing costs to more neutral levels and better positioning the economy for the potential crosswinds of a tariff war.】
